alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 4:35PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, northwestern Hartford, southwestern Worcester, southern Hampshire, central Franklin and Hampden Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tolland, or 15 miles west of Westfield, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Windsor, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Simsbury, Ludlow, Bloomfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Belchertown and Wilbraham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
